author: Simon Johnstone
comment: Love the game, but wish the colors were a bit more vibrant as they look a little dull. Also wish it had sound like the original game.

author: Hedgie Hog
comment: No sound
Most Popular game I have ever played fantastically​, funniest app yay

author: Nathan Pettus
comment: Clean-cut, simply works, embodies the original.   --Only thing: Would be nice to have 'Confirm Exit' (or similar) on back key press; lost a high score by accidentally backing out- and app session restarted :/

reply.author: Red Wire
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. I'm planning an update soon; I'll try to make colors shine a little bit more ;)

title: Barebones neatly designed Simon!

author: Adam Kroupa
comment: This game on Sony Smartwatch 3 (square screen)  is broken. The buttons are all weirdly placed on the screen. Too bad :c Also the game shows unnecessary notifications. Can you please write me once you fix the issue with square devices? Thank you.

reply.author: Red Wire
reply.content:
Hello Adam,

I've just pushed an update to fix that issue! Thank you!

reply.content:

comment: I tried to install it, but it wouldn't load onto either a moto 360 or an LG g watch. I could only play it on my phone, which is NOT what I was looking for or what was described.

reply.content:
Hello Tristan,

I've just pushed an update and I've tested with a Asus Zenwatch and it works properly. Try to update your wear app!
